description:
It’s the girls` last day of high school! After graduation, they are no longer high school students, but their high school friendship will forever remain.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Ensimmäiset valmistujaiset - Tuhat tunnetta - Suru - Vanha koulumme - Me kaikki
Erste Abschlussfeier / Tausend Gefühle / Trauer / Alma Mater / Alle gemeinsam
First Graduation Ever / A Thousand Emotions / Sorrow / Alma Mater / Everyone
Hajimete no Sotsugyou / Bankan / Kanashimi / Bokou / Minna
